app_description: Photo translator camera Is an application designed specifically for travel. For example even if you speak the language of the country you are traveling to very well you may encounter something unusual and not remember the exact name in that foreign language. In such situations the Photo translator camera application will be very useful. You just need to select the desired language and take a photo of the sign or menu the translation you need. Photo translator camera is a great helper for translating texts as well. You can translate entire pages of text into the desired language in a matter of seconds. Take a photo of the pages of the document or upload a photo from your photo gallery. Triplens will scan the text and translate it into any language you need. EXPERIENCE AND PREMIUM ADVANTAGES: We offer both free trial and in app purchases that require a specific fee to access additional features. Our Premium version provides unlimited access to all features. Free version: In our free version of Photo translator camera you can get hundreds of text and object translations. You can uninstall the free version by uninstalling the app from your device. Trial version. In the free trial version of the Photo translator camera app you can have unlimited access to all the functions of the app. After the end of the trial period you will be charged for the package and you will be transferred to the paid version.
